text.p: Welcome to the spaceship ${name.ship}, an exploration vessel with a crew of 25. You are one of the officers on a mission in the deep regions of the galaxy.

Each mission consists of a maximum number of turns, you must reach the mission's goal before that. On each turn you have two actions. If you're done with your actions, press the "${game.next-turn}" button.

texts.text:
Mission 1: The Barracks
Suddenly, a harsh stop of the ship awakes you. You look around your room in the barrack-section of the ship. Your roomate ${name.roommate} is lying facedown on the ground in a pool of blood. Was has happened to the ship?
Mission goal: Leave the barracks and inspect the further regions of the ship. Maybe you also find something useful in the barracks
